pages.text: An enchant that you can get on medals and binders. Whenever you die and an item with Buddy Binding on it would normally drop on the floor and eventually despawn,it has a chance to stay in your inventory after death. This chance goes up with every level of Buddy Binding, from 56%, to 80%, to 100%.

pages.title: Enchant Levels
pages.text: Buddy Binding has 3 levels. For Buddy Binding I, any enchantment table will do. For II, you will need a level 15 enchanting table, and for III you will need a level 30, or maxed out, enchanting table.
